Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats

Class PValue

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats.PValue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<PValue>
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoTerm2PValAndCounts
public class PValue extends Object implements Comparable<PValue>
This class is used to store an item (an ontology TermId) and its associated raw and adjusted p values.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected final TermId
    item
    The Ontology TermId whose overrepresentation has been assessed to have this p-value.
    protected double
    p_adjusted
    The adjusted p_raw value of a test (adjusted according to a method such as Bonferoni or Bejamini Holm).
    protected final double
    p_raw
    The nominal (i.e., uncorrected) p-value for this item.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    PValue(TermId item, double p)
    This constructor takes an Item for which a pvalue was calculated.

  • Field Details

    • item

      protected final TermId item
      The Ontology TermId whose overrepresentation has been assessed to have this p-value.

    • p_raw

      protected final double p_raw
      The nominal (i.e., uncorrected) p-value for this item.

    • p_adjusted

      protected double p_adjusted
      The adjusted p_raw value of a test (adjusted according to a method such as Bonferoni or Bejamini Holm).

  • Constructor Details

    • PValue

      public PValue(TermId item, double p)
      This constructor takes an Item for which a pvalue was calculated. It assigned both p_raw (the raw pavel) and p_adjusted to this value (i.e., by default there is no multiple testing correction. The class is designed to be used with other classes such as Bonferroni to adjust the raw pvalues that are stored in p_adjusted.
      Parameters:
      item - An item whose p value was calculated
      p - the corresponding p value
